text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly mentions the possibility of civil action in Italy, which includes seeking preliminary injunctions and seizure orders, which are mechanisms to stop the infringing activity (shirt sales). Specifically, under section F.5, it states: 'Civil action / injunction: If you can identify a producer/distributor with assets, Italy offers: - Preliminary injunctions (fast relief if strong evidence) - Seizure orders'. This directly addresses the criterion of stating the client could ask for an injunction to stop the infringing activity.", "criterion_id": "945c4aa2-6d30-480f-a7da-a8bdc1e09081"}
